lockedDescription: A locked user will no longer be able to access the system
min-1: You must select at least one user
name: Name
verifiedDescription: This will verify the user without them having to log in via email.

errors.duplicatedUser: The email address you entered is already in use.

verification.title: Verification
verification.invalidateError: Error trying to invalidate the user

help.newUser: By completing this form, the user will be immediately created in the system with the data provided. An email will be sent notifying the user that they have been added as a user, along with a link to complete their registration and set up their account.
help.inviteUser: This form sends an invitation to the indicated email, but does not create the user immediately. The recipient will receive an email with a link to accept the invitation. Only when the link is accepted, the user will be created in the system and they will be able to complete their data.
